user_query: I'm writing a blog post about famous historical figures. Can you provide me with some interesting facts about famous personalities like Albert Einstein, Leonardo da Vinci, and Marie Curie? It would be great if you could also include their gender breakdown. And if possible, can you recommend some books or documentaries about these figures?

TaskList.description: Retrieve interesting facts about Albert Einstein, Leonardo da Vinci, and Marie Curie.
Compile and analyze the gender breakdown of the historical figures.
Recommend books or documentaries related to the figures.
